name: Total Carnage
overview: Captain Carnage is in charge of your force... all right he is your force. That's right - one man against an entire army! If you need better odds, this isn't your game! Here's your mission: with your one-man ground force, you must stop a mad dictator bent on destroying the world! Rescue civilians, eliminate key targets, and destroy General Akhboob's bio-nuclear generators, which he's using to create his endless mutant army! On your side: an awesome arsenal of the 21st century's most destructive weaponry. On their side: battle zones full of the nastiest mutated enemies and the baddest bosses you'll ever want to see!
